section.p: You try to cut the king down, but at the last moment, he catches your wrist. His face is a mask of hate and rage. ‘Traitorous viper!’ he hisses, before shouting for the guards. You are forced to flee for your life.

Although you make it out of the stockade, you are caught in a narrow defile and seized by many men. You are hauled before Captain Vorkung, who looks sick and ashen-faced - he let you in to see the king in the first place.
You are sentenced to be hanged; the sentence is carried out immediately. Your adventures are over, unless you have a resurrection deal.
